reviewText: Season Two is not as good as season one but hold on, as this show is just hitting its stride so that by season three it is terrific. This season presents a very good serial murder story but it doesn't do anything gound breaking yet. The serial murderer is very clever.  He has his wife cover for him, his girlfriend, his child, a retarded man and two brothers.  Our detectives are able to press his prosecution after he mistakenly leaves one victim alive. However with all the covering up by all of these other people it is an up hill battle. There is more courtroom aspect to this one than any of the others and some are going to find that a little tedious after awhile.  There is a dynamite resolution, however, so hang in there.
summary: Male Creep as Sadistic Serial Killer
Title: Trial and Retribution: Set 2

reviewText: BBC does it again.EVERY season was sensational.US commercial television should get hints in how to do a show the right way.BBC is RAW at times,but it tells a story.
Title: Trial and Retribution: Set 2

reviewText: Each and every Trial & Retribution is a classic, a masterpiece. I am anxiously awaiting the upcoming latest set being released June 15 on Amazon. I love the character studies, the twists, the turns, the personalities. Once you start watching, you will be hooked. I am.
Title: Trial and Retribution: Set 2

reviewText: It was o.k. I would not recommend it  I thought it was too brutal and the murder scenes too gory.
Title: Trial and Retribution: Set 2
